Actually, that's not entirely true. There's an option somewhere where  
you can tell Eclipse which static imports to try when completing. It  
makes life much easier.

S.

On 19 May 2009, at 07:02, Martijn Dashorst wrote:
> Would make the static import problem go away. I also think this is
> nicer to program as static imports are not yet nicely supported by
> Eclipse (haven't used them with other IDEs though).
